text: Arau allahe yadi manuhara akalyana (praarthanata sahamrai di'omte) kharakheda karailehemtena, yenekai te'om sihamtara kalyana (praarthanata sahamrai di'omte) kharadhara karae, tente arasye sihamtara mrtyura samaya ahi gaâ€™lehemtena. Gatike yisakale amara saksatara asa posana nakarae sihamtaka ami sihamtara abadhyatata udbhraantara darae ghurai phuraibalai erai di'om
